headline: Cummins Ties Maintenance Program To Destination Zero And Service Growth
summary: Cummins (NYSE:CMI) is highlighting its Planned Equipment Maintenance program as a key part of its Destination Zero growth strategy. The PEM initiative focuses on cutting carbon emissions and improving equipment reliability through structured maintenance practices. The program reflects wider industry interest in decarbonization and operational efficiency for heavy equipment and power solutions. Cummins, trading at $578.82, is tying its maintenance services more closely to its Destination...
